thread.title: NY firefighter killed in blaze on set of Bruce Willis movie

title: NY firefighter killed in blaze on set of Bruce Willis movie
text:
NY firefighter killed in blaze on set of Bruce Willis movie 4:01pm GMT - 00:50 
A New York City firefighter Michael Davidson was killed and five others including two firefighters were injured in a blaze in a historic building where a movie starring Bruce Willis and Alec Baldwin was being filmed. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A New York City firefighter Michael Davidson was killed and five others including two firefighters were injured in a blaze in a historic building where a movie starring Bruce Willis and Alec Baldwin was being filmed.
